lines.text: You pulled a whip on me? Are you out of your fucking mind? Let me tell you something - DON'T YOU EVER PULL A WHIP ON A BLACK MAN AGAIN!
Let's kick his ass and take his coat!
Look, it's my favorite cheese-eating dickmonkey.
Funny, 'cause the image that Americans have of China is that's it's a country full of people with little tiny feet, and they run around and kick the shit out of each other everyday.
Well that's the same image we have of America, except you guys have big feet and kick the shit out of each other less gracefully.
Yeah, I can see that.
I knew these guys weren't real cops.
They're real... Real Dirty.
What the hell were you doing while I was getting my ass kicked?
I was catching up on an episode of "Walter - the Einstein frog".
I'll be Sonny, you be Cher, Share with me!
Back to plan A.
What's plan A?
Don't get shot.
Good plan!
[Before jumping]
It's suicide, you wanna talk about it?
Tell me on the way down.
Hey man, tell me about China. Is there a lot of Kung Fu shit going on?
What do you mean?
Like guys coming up to each other on the street going 'hmm... Your Kung Fu is pretty useless, as well as obsolete. You insult me! You bastard. Prepare to die!'
No, not a whole lot...
I swear Hedgehog, all this junk food you eat is gonna turn into one smelly mound of shit.
My bodily functions don't concern you!
Yeah, well they do when I've gotta be subjected to the consequences of your flatulence!
Are you okay?
Okay? OKAY? I'm in one piece, motherfucker, but okay's something I ain't been since we met!
It's time to come home, Toby.
Oh He's a fucking cheeseburger!
He works for a living
He's a cheeseburger.
A Cheeseburger?
Yes... A Nasty, fat, coagulating around your heart, not good for you cheeseburger...
I don't know why you want to waste so much time writing those sappy love songs when no-one wants to hear 'em. Least of all, the woman who dumped your sorry ass.
Oh, well thank you Doctor! I feel so much better now!
The truth hurts, baby.
You don't look like Miss Daisy, I should be driving you no fucking where.
Shut up!
Can't smoke can't talk, I'm fucking covered. You take the car, I'll walk. Drive your own fucking self.
Just shoot us Madison, don't bore us to death.
We've been doing this shit for a long time, you can tattoo that on your ass!
Just relax, and drive.
Let's go let's go!
We are going, this ain't the Batmobile!
You owe me...
I owe you what?
Entertainment, chocolate boy wonder!
You're under arrest!
Under arrest? I'm a fucking hostage!
Time to blow!
Time to blow?
I got a funny feeling we're about to see some familiar faces.
Funny feeling? Well, your definition of funny and mine must be completely different, because I don't see a damn thing funny!
Hey, you can see me can't you? Then why don't you speak English as soon as my ugly mug pops up or do I have to come over there and bitch-slap you!
Son of bitch can eat flower and shit cupcakes!
They say you can tell what a man's like, by the type of car that he drives. So when did Godzilla get a hold of your car?
I think we've done all the damage we could here, wanna go blow up something in LA?
They're not supposed to kill me, I'm too valuable to them.

Valuable? Oh, you're about a penny a pound as far as I'm concerned. If you're so fucking precious, why did you kidnap me? Why did you get me involved, I mean I know I'm good looking but damn! This is like shit on Malik week!
So what, her parents didn't dig you 'cause you're a psychotic Ninja killer?
This is the original five fingers of death right here.
Aren't they all?
Don't smoke in the car!
I'm sorry, you don't want me to smoke, in MY car? Can I open a window and smoke? Oh, this is fun, this is fucking fun. You know what, you're right, you're absolutely right, I'm gonna quit!
Are you out of your mind?
Ok
You left Bria with the Asshole?
His name is Steve.
Oh, I forgot, the asshole part is silent!
Stick your head between your legs and kiss your ass goodbye, turbo drive!
